attr.title: Breaker
attr.desc: BREAKER is a blend of BREAKOUT, SPACE INVADERS, and IKARUGA. The game features 9 bosses and 3 minibosses, 30+ unlockable palettes, and a color-switching mechanic where you deflect blue bullets while blue and red bullets while red. Sound effects by Martin Kvale with OST by DUBMOOD.
attr.inst: Download BREAKER.exe from https://managore.itch.io/breaker and place it in the /ports/breaker/gamedata
